Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 462 Filed 11/15/21 Page 28 of 32
Juror ID:_____

DECLARATION
I, Juror Number _____ declare under penalty of perjury that the foregoing answers set forth in this Jury Questionnaire are true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. I have not discussed my answers with others, or received assistance in completing the questionnaire.
Signed this _____ day of November, 2021

DO NOT WRITE YOUR NAME. PLEASE SIGN USING YOUR JUROR NUMBER.

-27-
DOJ-OGR-00007044

text_blocks.content: I, Juror Number _____ declare under penalty of perjury that the foregoing answers set forth in this Jury Questionnaire are true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. I have not discussed my answers with others, or received assistance in completing the questionnaire.
DO NOT WRITE YOUR NAME. PLEASE SIGN USING YOUR JUROR NUMBER.

additional_notes: The document is a jury questionnaire declaration page. It contains a declaration statement to be signed by a juror, with instructions not to write their name but to sign using their juror number. The page is part of a larger document (Document 462) in a court case (Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE).
